solution_line_template: In total, Bryan would have done {num_sets} sets * {pushups_per_set} push-ups/set = <<{num_sets}*{pushups_per_set}={total_planned_pushups}>>{total_planned_pushups} push-ups.

Subtracting the push-ups he didn't do in the third set, Bryan did {total_planned_pushups} push-ups - {fewer_pushups} push-ups = <<{total_planned_pushups}-{fewer_pushups}={actual_total_pushups}>>{actual_total_pushups} push-ups.
